data.name: JermaSlots
data.detailed_description:
Hey gamers! That's right! You!

Ever wanted to step into the compact shoes of everyone's favorite TWITCH streamer, Jerma985 and spend your hard earned BIG BITS on a slot machine? Well now is your chance!*

So load up, go grab yourself a nice hot cup of coffee, hot cup of cocoa. I got apple cider right here freshly brewed. Let me take a sip, ah that's some good cider!

FEATURES

  • Jerma Emote Slot Machine!
  • SIX winning combinations all with their own events!
  • Escape Menu Cheats to get all winning combinations and see all the events and mini-games!
  • Three Additional mini-games revolving around JUP, Glueman, and the ever lovable Byeahs!
  • Three graphics modes including "Full", "Half", and even "None"!
  • Tons of references to Jerma985 and the Jerma985 expanded universe!

*NO ACTUAL BITS OR BALDCOINS ARE EXCHANGED

NOTE: This game is purely a fan game and is not affiliated with Jerma985. He did not commission the game and any views or content in game is not representative of Jerma985. This game is 100% free with absolutely no advertisements or any in game purchases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD Processor, 2.5 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board Sound
